meaningMnemonic: On a <radical>scooter</radical> there is a <radical>bear</radical> with a <radical>drop</radical> on its head trying to <kanji>follow</kanji> and <kanji>chase</kanji> you! You accidentally splashed it with water and it's not happy about it. You're on your own scooter, luckily, but that doesn't make this any less terrifying.
readingMnemonic: The bear is trying to <kanji>follow</kanji> you because it wants your <reading>o</reading>bi (お) as compensation for its injured pride. The obi is waving in the wind behind your scooter, and the bear is reaching out with its teeth to try and grab it.
